name: Number Facts
description:
it's a bullet hell game with facts about numbers!

the following gamemodes are provided:

  • classic (press C): the original form of the game. can be cheated really easily. survive 30 seconds.
  • endless (press E): randomly chosen maps and patterns. no win condition.
  • snake (press N): a challenge mode where you have to carefully plan your moves and stall as much as possible.

each of these modes also has a "hard mode" version. hard mode can be toggled with the H key.
